name: Lay Down, Wyatt
description:
Wyatt is struggling
He's out of the hospital for the fourth time
This last time he thought there were people out to get him

No one was harmed but,
every relapse is getting worse



Does he really see what's happening?




A short action story by:
Huntrox - Programmer
Swagshaw - Writer/VA
CWeed420 - Music
